GLITTERING CORAL + TURQUOISE BRACELETS
description: Reconnect with nature with this coral + turquoise bracelets and shine your beautiful soul this summer. Price per each. Once thought to be a plant, coral has been called the "garden of the sea". The ancient Egyptians placed pieces of coral in tombs as a protection against evil spirits because they believed that each piece truly contained a drop of divine blood. According to Greek mythology, when Perseus chopped off the head of the Gorgon Medusa, some drops of blood splashed into the sea, and thereby solidified into coral. Records dating back thousands of years confirm that coral was used in decorative art objects as well as jewelry. Coral symbolizes joy and happiness, it enables the wearer to enjoy life. MADE BY HAND IN MIAMI WITH LOVE.

description: MIrror Mirror on the Wall... Who is the DIVAest of them all! It's known in history that in ancient Mexico this mineral was used as a mirror and its reflectiveness is considered to protect the person who carries it, or meditates with it from the negativity of others. This rock might not be the real deal "gold" but it is gold for the mind. So BEWARE: this stone sits on your neck with glory and it will spark your creativity and open you to new ideas. Pair it with one of the sparkling pyrite dangle bangles and you are set to ignite the night of fire... Materials: Oval pyrite stone and faceted smoked topaz necklace with lobster claw.

name: PYRITE DANGLE BRACELET
description: Pyrite Stone is known as "GOLD FOR THE MIND"! Sparkle your wardrobe and secretly your mind and intuition with this beautifully hand wired 14k bracelet with dangle. Materials: Pyrite stone, 14 gf hand wire, lobster claw, adjustable to desire length. Pair it with our stretchable pyrite bracelets!
